text: William Dean Naulls (October 7, 1934 – November 22, 2018) was an American basketball player. He played professionally in the National Basketball Association from 1956 to 1966. He was born in Dallas, Texas, but was raised in Los Angeles, California. He played for the St. Louis Hawks, New York Knicks, Golden State Warriors and the Boston Celtics.NCAA Basketball's Finest - All- Americans (UPI, Look, NEA, Collier's & International News Service) p.208NCAA Record Book - Award Winnersp.137. Accessed 2009-05-05. 2009-05-04. Naulls died on November 22, 2018 in Laguna Niguel, California from respiratory failure at the age of 84. ==References== ==Other websites== *Career stats at basketball- reference.com *Where Are They Now? at nba.com *UCLA Bruins sports – Men's basketball media guide Category:1934 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from respiratory failure Category:Disease-related deaths in California Category:Atlanta Hawks players Category:New York Knicks players Category:Golden State Warriors players Category:Boston Celtics players Category:Sportspeople from Dallas Category:Sportspeople from Los Angeles
title: Willie Naulls
